body: mutation {createproduct (product: { id: "83b43636-6594-4fa8-8ab1-a71f2f1b7b1f", name: "Testing Entity Indexing", sku: "abc1234", ship: true, shipping_delay:3600,  fulfillment_provider:"1bd805d0-0062-499b-ae28-00c5d1b827ba", default_price:4.99, dynamic_pricing: { min: 3.99, max: 5.99 }, attributes: { weight: { units: 2.33, unitofmeasurement: "kilos" }, dimensions: { width: { units: 2, unitofmeasurement: "centimeters" }, height: { units: 3, unitofmeasurement: "centimeters" }, length: { units: 4, unitofmeasurement: "centimeters" } } images: [{path:"somepath", name: "testimage", description:"this is a test", format:"jpeg", dimensions: {width: 400, height: 300 }},{path:"somepath", name: "testimage2", default_image: true, description:"this is another test", format:"jpeg", dimensions: {width: 400, height: 200 }}]} }) {id, name, sku, ship, shipping_delay, default_price, dynamic_pricing { min, max }, fulfillment_provider { id, name, provider { name } }, attributes { weight { units, unitofmeasurement }, dimensions { width { units, unitofmeasurement }, height { units, unitofmeasurement }, length { units, unitofmeasurement } }, images { path, dimensions { width, height}, name, description, default_image, format } },created_at, updated_at}}
